channel.title: Slayer Door
channel.description:
My source is (Shards) Project no-Doze. How would I get the doors in the Slayer tower to open? When I click them, Nothing happens... At the moment I just have set to send a string once it has been clicked (testing purposes) But it does not even send...
I have added the ObjectConstants: [CODE]SLAYER_DOOR = 10527;[/CODE] & [CODE]public int[][] objectCommander = { { 10527, SLAYER_DOOR, 1, 500}, [/CODE]
I have added the ObjectController: [CODE]case ObjectConstants.SLAYER_DOOR: client.getActionSender().sendMessage("debug");
break;[/CODE]
Will Rep+Thank!

item.title: Slayer Door
item.dc:creator: @iBucky iBucky
item.description:
@iBucky wrote:

Docent:

Did you tell it what to do when the object is clicked?..

That’s what this is:

[code]case ObjectConstants.SLAYER_DOOR:
client.getActionSender().sendMessage(“debug”);

break;[/code]

Did you actually read my post? Rofl

Read full topic

item.title: Slayer Door
item.dc:creator: @iBucky iBucky
item.description:
@iBucky wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:4, topic:531764”][quote author=iBucky link=topic=650549.msg4366709#msg4366709 date=1379813681]

Gotta warn u guys, this is a tricky one.

Arham, I managed to fix the staircase issue. This is a total different issue as absolutely nothing happen when I click the door
[/quote]
Oh. O.o

P.S: What was the fix, pshh?[/quote]

The issue was with object sizing, Obviously… We knew that. But the sizing was un-documented, so finding where it was handled was difficult, I found it and corrected it.

Then documented it!!

Read full topic
